name: Aliens Attack (ExcitedGames)
description:
Game Description

Aliens Attack is a 9 levels shooter Arcade video game. 
Winning each level is challenging and Adrenaline Booster. 
The game is enjoyable and will make you fun. Winning a level is simple: Kill enemies, and escape from bullets and obstacles.

Controllers MENU NAVIGATION
  • Menu Navigation : Left click on the mouse
KEYBOARD
  • Move Left : Left Arrow (or A)
  • Move Right : Right Arrow (or D)
  • Jump : Up Arrow (or W)
  • Shoot : Space Bar
JOYSTICK

Support for Xbox Joystick

  • Move Left : Left Direction on Left Stick (or Right Stick)
  • Move Right : Right Direction on Left Stick (or Right Stick)
  • Jump : A Button (or Left Bumper)
  • Shoot : Right Bumper
Thanks!

Thank you for visiting this page. 
Aliens Attack was created in order to make you fun.
I wish you a challenging and fun experience with it. 
Cheers 😜
